levels.description:
Passive Effect: becomes more likely to be attacked
Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>; every time Yu is attacked, deals <@ba.vup>{ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> of Yu's ATK as <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn damage</> to the attacker
